name: Mastery Talisman: Press the Advantage
description: When an opposing character is defeated during your Action during this Round: You can continue to act again when that Action ends, and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you switch characters. This switch will be considered a Fast Action rather than a Combat Action.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When an opposing character is defeated during your Action during this Round:</color> You can continue to act again when that Action ends, and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you switch characters. This switch will be considered a $[K2] rather than a $[K1].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When an opposing character is defeated during your Action during this Round:</color> You can continue to act again when that Action ends, and spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you switch characters. This switch will be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> rather than a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>.
